code: import React,{useRef}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var LoginAdmin=function LoginAdmin(){var email=useRef(null);var pwd=useRef(null);var HandleLogin=function HandleLogin(event){event.preventDefault();var content={method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}};content.body=JSON.stringify({email:email.current.value,password:pwd.current.value});fetch("https://encherecloudws-production.up.railway.app/admins/checkLogin",content).then(function(response){if(response.status!==200){throw new Error(response);}else if(response.status===200)return response.text();}).then(function(token){localStorage.setItem("tokenAdmin",token);window.location.href="/accueil";}).catch(function(error){alert("Mot de passe non identifier");});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"parent clearfix",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-illustration",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"burger-btn",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["Login to access to",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"your account"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-form",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{action:"submit",method:"post",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:email,defaultValue:"admin@gmail.com",type:"email",placeholder:"E-mail Address"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:pwd,defaultValue:"mdp",type:"password",placeholder:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",onClick:HandleLogin,children:"LOG-IN"})]})})]})})]});};export default LoginAdmin;
